Guard Jacob: How do you do, honored traveler? Have you come to our village to see the great shell of "cruma"? If you have, then you'd be well advised to give up your search. Many have come to this village to view the shell of cruma, but I have rarely seen anyone return from that place intact. The "Marshlands" where the shell of cruma lies have for ages been a place teeming with monsters -- even our guards don't like to go near there.
